DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Processed data and covariates for each bird sister species pair
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: This file contains all data (variability of body mass across species ranges) and covariates assembled for each tropical-nontropical bird sister species pair identified from a global bird phylogeny. Detailed metadata for each column, including description, units, and data source, are in another associated file: bird_sister_species_column_metadata.txt.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: body size
niche

birds
